entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • APIs for identity management #47288
    .NET 8.0
  • Consider in-repo documentation for diagnostic codes used in repo #47287
  • Auth improvements in ASP.NET Core 8 #47286
    .NET 8.0
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #47284
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #47283
  • Getting ArgumentOutOfRangeException when accessing a list by index within HTML class attribute #47281
  • Blazor Server using MSI and EFCore #47279
  • Minmal .NET API - Delegate 'RequestDelegate' does not take 0 arguments #47275
  • Blazor Custom Elements Documentation Vanished #47273

Closed

  • Add Route Short Circuit middleware #46071
    8.0-preview4
  • Blazor United: SSR endpoint definition #46985
    8.0-preview3
  • Blazor United: SSR endpoint metadata and integration with ASP.NET #46984
    8.0-preview3
  • ProblemHttpResult should use custom defaults #47045
    .NET 8 Planning
  • How to configure specific paths for an endpoint different from others? #47257
  • Ability to monitor circuit activity #30287
    8.0-preview3
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudAddProduct #47160
  • Blazor United: SSR endpoint registration #46982
    8.0-preview3
  • Blazor Sections API Proposal #46937
    8.0-preview3
  • Cannot load PDBs for Microsoft.AspNetCore within .Net 7.0.3 #47113
  • GetFolderPath call in Hosting negatively affects startup performance #47269
  • Quarantine MapAction_JsonBodyOrService_HandlesBothJsonAndService #47274
  • Possible request delegate generator bug with non-valid C# identifier names #47129
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf improvement: json #47263
  • adding PhysicalFileProvider causes 404 on other static files #47136
  • Generate self-signed certificate for local domain when debugging in Visual Studio #47186
  • [AOT] Publish gRPC app as Native AOT with no warnings #45888
    8.0-preview3
  • Only invoke 'IsService' check once in resolution #47224
    8.0-preview3
  • SignalR - Clients Not Receiving Messages in Integration Tests #47260

PullRequests

Created

  • Add TypedResults.Extentensions #47285
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Enable SingleFileAnalyzer #47282
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed duplicate LoggerMessage EventNames in RemoteJSRuntime.cs file #47280
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [blazor] Configure mono runtime with startupMemoryCache and runtimeOptions #47277
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview3

Merged

  • Add short circuit in routing #46713
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview3
  • [Blazor] Endpoint discovery #47126
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview3
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `50e07d1` to `e49c6b9` #47276
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Add LookupName to EndpointParameter. #47272
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Use IProblemDetailsService in ProblemHttpResult #47100
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview3
  • Ability to monitor Blazor Server circuit activity #46968
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview3
  • Add SectionName to SectionOutlet and SectionContent #47221
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview3
  • Use Environment.SystemDirectory to get system directory #47271
    area-hosting, 8.0-preview3
  • Only invoke 'IsService' check once in resolution #47097
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Meter factory prototype #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #47114
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • DbContextHealthCheck handles exceptions thrown by CustomTestQuery #47121
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix x86 folder contents in ARM64 Windows Server Hosting Bundle installer #47124
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
